original_title: Singer Premium Furniture at One Galle Face Presents a Furniture Styling Workshop for Customers
original_body_lines: Singer Sri Lanka, a renowned name in the furniture industry was thrilled to have invited customers to an exclusive workshop on “Mastering Furniture Styling.” The event took place on 24th June 2023, at Singer’s Flagship Store for Premium Furniture at One Galle Face.

The workshop aimed to empower valuable customers with the knowledge and skills necessary to select, place, and accessorize furniture for stunning living spaces. Pasanga Abeywardena, Managing Director & Head of Interior Design at Pasanga Abeywardena Designs (Pvt) Ltd., conducted the workshop, sharing her expertise and experience in the field. Ms. Abeywardena guided participants through the intricacies of furniture styling, helping them transform their homes into havens of style and comfort.

“We believe that furniture styling is an art that can elevate any space,”says Pasanga Abeywardena, renowned interior designer. “I’m impressed by the exquisite furniture pieces showcased at Singer’s Flagship Store and I am truly delighted to have had the opportunity to share my insights and help customers create truly exceptional living spaces.”

This event held special significance as it followed the recent opening of Singer’s Flagship Store for Premium Furniture at One Galle Face on 2nd June 2023. The store showcases a wide range of exquisite furniture designed to enhance living spaces, and Singer wanted to ensure customers made the most of their purchases.

“I attended the Furniture Styling Workshop at Singer’s Flagship Store, and it was a game-changer for me. I now feel confident in selecting and arranging furniture to create a stylish and comfortable home.” shares a satisfied customer.

A special invitation was extended to customers who recently participated in the Kedella and Build SL Construction exhibitions. Additionally, FREE registrations for this exclusive workshop were made available through Singer’s official social media pages.

As an added benefit, workshop participants became eligible for exclusive discounts on furniture purchases from Singer’s Flagship Store for Premium Furniture at One Galle Face. This unique opportunity allowed them to bring elegance and sophistication into their homes while enjoying exceptional savings.
Customers are encouraged to stay tuned for more exciting events and workshops at Singer’s Flagship Store for Premium Furniture at One Galle Face. Follow our official social media pages for updates.
